sentences.en: "But we might ruin the stove." — "Who cares?"
sentences.cn: “可我们会把炉子弄坏的!”——“我才不在乎呢！”

sentences.en: All this mud’s going to ruin my shoes.
sentences.cn: 这泥巴会把我的鞋弄坏。

sentences.en: an interesting old ruin
sentences.cn: 一处有意思的古老废墟

sentences.en: Bad weather and car trouble conspired to ruin our vacation.
sentences.cn: 恶劣的气候连同汽车故障断送了我们的假日.

sentences.en: He plotted the ruin of his enemy.
sentences.cn: 他阴谋倾覆他的敌人.

sentences.en: His career would be ruined.
sentences.cn: 他的事业将被毁掉。

sentences.en: His enemies are determined to ruin him.
sentences.cn: 他的敌人决意要毁了他。

sentences.en: His enemies maliciously conspired to ruin him.
sentences.cn: 他的敌人恶毒地密谋搞垮他.

sentences.en: It would only serve to precipitate his ruin.
sentences.cn: 它只会加速他的毁灭.

sentences.en: Jefferson was ruined by the lawsuit.
sentences.cn: 杰弗逊因为那场官司倾家荡产。

sentences.en: Ruin stared him in the face.
sentences.cn: 他面临破产.

sentences.en: The abbey is now a ruin.
sentences.cn: 那座修道院现已成废墟.

sentences.en: The church has fallen into ruin.
sentences.cn: 那教堂已破败不堪.

sentences.en: the economy was in ruins.
sentences.cn: 经济崩溃了。

sentences.en: The old house soon went to rack and ruin.
sentences.cn: 这所旧房子很快就毁坏了.

sentences.en: the ruins of a bombed-out office block
sentences.cn: 被炸毁的办公楼的废墟

sentences.en: The tower collapsed in a heap of ruin.
sentences.cn: 这座塔倒塌了,成为一堆废墟.

sentences.en: The vineyards were falling into ruin.
sentences.cn: 这些葡萄园日渐没落。

sentences.en: This illness has ruined my life.
sentences.cn: 这个病毁掉了我的生活。

sentences.en: We looked out upon a scene of desolation and ruin.
sentences.cn: 我们放眼望去，眼前是一片荒凉的废墟。

sentences.en: We've created a beautiful new building from out of an old ruin.
sentences.cn: 我们从废墟上创建了一幢漂亮的新楼.

sentences.en: What can we do to preserve the company from ruin?
sentences.cn: 我们怎么做才能保护这家公司不破产?
